Title: Motorcycle Diaries
Author: Che Guevara
Description: A memoir that chronicles Guevara's travels through South America with his friend Alberto Granado

Title: Guerilla Warfare
Author: Che Guevara
Description: A manual that outlined Guevara's philosophy and tactics for conducting guerrilla warfare

Title: Socialism and man in Cuba
Author: Che Guevara
Description: n essay in which Guevara discussed the need for a new socialist man and the relationship between socialism and individual freedom.
